mods.abstract: Frank J. and Lillian (Wrenn) Williams lived at 1625 West Clinch Street in Knoxville, Tennessee where Lillian maintained the garden shown here.
mods.note: Mrs. A. C. Bruner donated this collection to the University of Tennessee. Creation dates were inferred from the dates associated with the archival collection and the activity dates of the Jim Thompson Company.

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

mods.abstract: Jane Jaques Johnston (1876-1950) was born to John Yates and Susan (Ayres) Johnston in Tennessee. She married Ebenezer Hepburn Saunders on October 24, 1901 and the couple lived at 421 West Main Street, where Jane maintained this garden.
mods.note: Mrs. A. C. Bruner donated this collection to the University of Tennessee. Creation dates were inferred from the dates associated with the archival collection and the activity dates of the Jim Thompson Company.

mods.abstract: Eleanor Spence was born on April 4, 1879 in Knoxville, Tennessee. She married Alfred Fanton Sanford (1875-1946) in November of 1903 and the couple lived at 2890 Kingston Pike, where Eleanor maintained this garden.
mods.note: Mrs. A. C. Bruner donated this collection to the University of Tennessee. Creation dates were inferred from the dates associated with the archival collection and the activity dates of the Jim Thompson Company.

mods.abstract: Eliza "Lida" Mills McClung (1882-1968) was born to Calvin Morgan and Annie (McGhee) McClung in Tennessee. She married William Cary Ross (1879-1956) on December 2, 1902 and the couple lived at 4155 Lyons View Pike, where Lida maintained the garden shown above.
mods.note: Mrs. A. C. Bruner donated this collection to the University of Tennessee. Creation dates were inferred from the dates associated with the archival collection and the activity dates of the Jim Thompson Company.
